Confluence

About

Joseph Abrahamson, tel, has worked as a designer, developer, an engineer, and a statistician. He's currently acting as a founding member of Reify Health building the fabric for streaming, reactive data flows in large scale clinical trials.

He enjoys solving problems in the divides between mathematics, engineering, and design and seeing those solutions bear fruit.
